abstract.text: An image-analysis request that finds and recognizes text in an image.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: By default, a text recognition request first locates all possible glyphs or characters in the input image, and then analyzes each string. To specify or limit the languages to find in the request, set the
property to an array that contains the names of the languages of text you want to recognize. Vision returns the result of this request in a

abstract.text: Detect, recognize, and structure text on a business card or receipt using Vision and VisionKit.

doc://com.apple.documentation/documentat.title: Structuring Recognized Text on a Document

abstract.text: Apply computer vision algorithms to perform a variety of tasks on input images and videos.
The abstract superclass for image-analysis requests that focus on a specific part of an image.
An image-analysis request that finds and recognizes text in an image.
A Boolean value that indicates whether to attempt detecting the language to use the appropriate model for recognition and language correction.
An array of strings to supplement the recognized languages at the word-recognition stage.
The minimum height, relative to the image height, of the text to recognize.
An array of languages to detect, in priority order.
A value that determines whether the request prioritizes accuracy or speed in text recognition.
The results of the text recognition request.
Returns the identifiers of the languages that the request supports.
Requests a list of languages that the specified revision recognizes.
A Boolean value that indicates whether the request applies language correction during the recognition process.
A constant for specifying revision 1 of the text recognition request.
A constant for specifying revision 2 of the text recognition request.
A constant for specifying revision 3 of the text recognition request.
A request that detects and recognizes regions of text in an image.
A protocol for providing progress information on long-running tasks in Vision.
Constants that identify the performance and accuracy of the text recognition.
Analyze and filter phone numbers from text in live capture by using Vision.

doc://com.apple.vision/documentation/Vis.title: Extracting phone numbers from text in images

abstract.text: Perform text recognition on a photo using the Vision frameworkâ€™s text-recognition request.
Add text-recognition features to your app using the Vision framework.
A protocol that objects adopt to provide functional copies of themselves.
The group of methods that are fundamental to all Objective-C objects.
A type that can be hashed into a `Hasher` to produce an integer hash value.
A type that can be compared for value equality.
A type with a customized textual representation.
A type with a customized textual representation suitable for debugging purposes.
A type whose instances can be encoded, and appropriately passed, as elements of a C `va_list`.
